title: Ticket #6585: condor_hold will pause factories not owned by the user
description:
condor_hold -all will pause job factories when the match the constraint, regardless of whether or not the user has the right to make changes to that job cluster.

The ownership checking code prevents any changes from being written to the job log, but does not permit the in-memory change of state of the factory itself.
